### Workshop Overview

The following training aims to introduce the participant to the basics of the R programming language. By the end of this training, you will have the skills to confidently tackle basic R functions and libraries for descriptive statistics and perform regression analysis.

### Instructor

**Kamal Romero** is a data scientist and R developer (external) at the Advanced Computing & ICT Services (JRC.T.6) unit. He is currently working on his Ph.D. thesis where he  conducts research in the field of dynamic stochastic general equilibrium models with incomplete markets. He also teaches courses on economic theory and quantitative methods.
